title: Strengthening Medical Practice Competencies: University Campus Informal Learning Space Design Project

context.prior_knowledge: Basic spatial design principles and PBL (Project-Based Learning) project experience
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can identify and explain at least three social interaction-promoting elements in informal learning spaces on campus
Learners can form PBL teams to create and present prototypes of space designs supporting collaborative science learning
Learners can improve space design proposals at least twice based on formative assessment feedback
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
